S04bsu018_u:214_2: pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvaśca pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavantametadavocan - "icchāmo vayam bhadanta
S04bsu018_u:215_0: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam

S04bsu018_u:241_1: tāvadiyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kaṃpitā prakaṃpitā saṃprakaṃpitā
S04bsu018_u:241_2: calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā kṣubhitā prakṣubhitā saṃprakṣubhitā garjitā pragarjitā saṃpragarjitā,
S04bsu018_u:243: tathārūpaścāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ yaddaśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:244: naiva tasmin samaye sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍaḥ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu018_u:245: daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamātikrāntā lokadhātavaḥ samāpāṇitalajātā saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:246: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu prativasanti,
S04bsu018_u:248: te tathāgatabalena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvantarhitā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā,
S04bsu018_u:249: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakārairvividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatraiva niṣeduḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaśravaṇārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:250: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāśca devanāgayakṣāsurakumbhāṇḍapiśācā [KpSū_27] yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvato yena ca bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:253: ye cātra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sannipatitāste sarve padmāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyanti sma,
S04bsu018_u:254: padmottaraṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇena parivṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:255: samanantarodāhṛtasya cāsya bhagavatā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśasya dvāsaptabhirgaṅgānadīvālikāsamairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairiyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā,
S04bsu018_u:256: dhāraṇīpratilabdhāśca te bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntān lokadhātusthān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma,
S04bsu018_u:258: āścaryaprāptāste samādhibalena bodhisattvavikurvitena ca buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā tasthuḥ /

S04bsu018_u:264: kevalamasya samādheḥ pratilābhāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān avabudhyate sarvajñajñānaṃ ca pratilabhate /

S04bsu018_u:272: ye ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanantāparyantā devāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā nāgā yakṣāsuramanuṣyāmanuṣyā vā imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ śroṣyanti,

S04bsu018_u:278: yadi tasya bodhisattvasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāṇi syurupacitāṇi tānyapyasya parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:280: yasya nāstyanantaryāṇi tasya tena janmanā sarvāṇyanyāni karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,

S04bsu018_u:289: bhakṣyānnapānaṃ dattvā dharmabhāṇakasyānuttarasya tathāgatāhārasya lābhī bhavati bodhisattvaḥ,

S04bsu018_u:292: tadevaṃ mahārthikaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ayaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ /

S04bsu018_u:298: gaṇanātikrāntāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇyudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan /

S04bsu018_u:303_1: āmantrayate - "abhijānāmyahaṃ kulaputra ye bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāsta imān
S04bsu018_u:303_2: daśāntarakalpān nirodhām avahitena cetasā viharitvāvaśiṣṭā bodhisattvā asya gaganamudrasya
S04bsu018_u:304_0: imān daśāntarakalpān dharmaṃ śrutvā daśasu dikṣu teṣu gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:304_1: teṣāṃ gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ bhagavatāmantike cittamabhiprasādya
S04bsu018_u:305: bhagavantametadavocan - "eṣāṃ bhadanta [KpSū_32] daśānāmantarakalpānām atyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttaraṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati?" /
S04bsu018_u:307: eṣām daśānām antarakalpānāmatyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04bsu018_u:310: tatra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāntikāddharmaṃ śroṣyati taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā kuśalamulānyavaropayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:312: so 'bhisaṃbuddhabodhiṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravaracakraṃ avaivartikacakraṃ pravartayitvā bahubodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāvaivartikāṃ sthāpayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:313: ye bodhisattvā iha daśāntarakalpān tasya sakāśādimaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaṃ deśāmānaṃ śroṣyanti te tasmin samaye dharmaṃ śrutvā ekajātipratibaddhā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:314: ye tu kalpaṃ śroṣyanti te bodhisattvāstasmin samaye bhūmimavakramiṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:316: tasminneva samaye imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ paryantato lapsyante" ityuktvā,
S04bsu018_u:317: candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vividhāni buddhaviṣayaprātihāryāṇi saṃdarśayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:318: gaganamudrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nārāyaṇaṃ samādhiṃ nidarśayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:324: yena bodhyāsane supravartitadharmacakro bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu018_u:326: yena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamāno bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi avaivartikāṃ sthāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:327_1: bodhisattvasaṅghena bhagavatāḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśya sthitāścandrottamo
S04bsu018_u:327_3: [KpSū_34] ca bodhisattvāstasyāmeva rātryāmatyayāt tasya bhagavataḥ śarīre pūjāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu018_u:329: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāste nirodhasamādhānenaitān daśāntarakalpān atināmayanti /
S04bsu018_u:330: gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu018_u:331: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ daśāntarakalpān kuśalamūlānyavaropitavān /
S04bsu018_u:332: so 'dyarātrāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ: tena cādya dharmacakraṃ pravartitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:335: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe bhāṣyamāṇe aśītīnāṃ bodhisattvanayutaśatasahasrāṇām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabdhā,
S04bsu018_u:340: atha khalu ratnacandravairocano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - "katamairbhadanta bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate?" /
S04bsu018_u:341: bhagavān āha - "caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:342: katamaiścaturbhi?, iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścaturṣvāryavaṃśeṣu vyavasthito bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:343: katameṣu caturṣu?, iha bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa cīvareṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:350: asmin prathame āryavaṃśe vyavasthito bhavati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:352: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāreṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:356: pratilabdhvāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte 'gṛddho hyagrathito 'mūrcchito 'navadhyavasito 'nadhyavasānamāpanna ādīnavadarśī niḥsaraṇaṃ prajānaṃ paribhuṅkte /
S04bsu018_u:358: ebhiścaturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate bhāvayati ca /
S04bsu018_u:359: aparaiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:362: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ātmanā śīlavāṃ viharati,
S04bsu018_u:366: parānapi śīlavirahitāṃ dṛṣṭvā śīlasaṃpade samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:367: anena prathamena dharmaṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:368: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dṛṣṭivyasanagatāṃ sattvāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ vyutthāpya samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:369: anena dvitīyena [KpSū_37] dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /

S04bsu018_u:542: athāraṇemī rājārājarddhyā mahatā ca rājānubhāvenānekaiḥ prāṇikoṭīnayutāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nagarān nirjagāma,
S04bsu018_u:544: yāvad eva yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena yātvā padbhyām evārāmaṃ prāviśad,
S04bsu018_u:546: upetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdad,
S04bsu018_u:547: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānam araṇeminaṃ ratnagarbhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
S04bsu018_u:548: anekaparyāyeṇa dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā tūṣṇīm abhūt /
S04bsu018_u:549_0: atha rājāraṇemī utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya yena ratnagarbhas
S04bsu018_u:549_1: tathāgatas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya ratnagarbham tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etad avocat /
S04bsu018_u:550: "adhivāsayatu me bhagavān idam traimāsaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:552: adhivāsayati kulaputra ratnagarbhas tathāgato rājño 'raṇeminaḥ tūṣṇībhāvena /
S04bsu018_u:553: atha rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:556: so 'haṃ yo me kaścid upabhogaparibhoga upasthānaṃ paricaryāntaḥpuraṃ ca gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato nivedayāmi bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:557: yad api yuṣmākaṃ paudgalikaṃ upabhogaparibhogopasthānaparicaryāntaḥpuraṃ gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato niryātayata bhikṣusaṅghasya ca" /
S04bsu018_u:560: tasmin nevodyāne bhagavato 'rthāya kūṭāgāraṃ māpayati saptaratnamayaṃ samantataḥ caturdiśaṃ cātra saptaratnamayāni dvārāṇi māpayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:562: te ca vṛkṣā nānāprakārairvastrairalaṅcakre nānāduṣyairnānācchatrairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairnānāprakāraiścābharaṇairnānāratnamayaiścābharaṇairvividhaiḥ [KpSū_56] sugandhaiḥ,
S04bsu018_u:567: tad api cakraratnaṃ bahiḥ kūṭāgārasya bhagavata evābhimukhaṃ puruṣamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe sthitaṃ jvalati /
S04bsu018_u:569: bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitvā bhagavata upari ratnavṛkṣaṃ dhārayati /
S04bsu018_u:570: sa ca vṛkṣo 'laṅkṛtaḥ saptabhī ratnairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairvicitraiścābharaṇairnānāvidhaiśca mālyairnānāraṅgaiśca paṭṭairnānāvidhaiśca duṣyairuparacitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:572: yā cāraṇemino rājño 'gramahiṣī sā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitā,
S04bsu018_u:575: tataḥ svayameva bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthāpayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:576: tatastayā maṇiratnābhayā sarvaṃ tadudyānaṃ satatasamitamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭaṃ abhūt,
S04bsu018_u:577: buddhābhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvamidaṃ [KpSū_57] satatasamitaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:578: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya gauśīrṣasyaiva candanasya pādapīṭhaṃ sthāpitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:579: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvaśveto hastināgaḥ sthāpita uparyevaṃrūpameva cakraratnaṃ puruṣapramāṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ yathā bhagavatastathā,
S04bsu018_u:580: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrataḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā kanyā sthāpitā gośīrṣoragasāracandanacūrnairavakirati,
S04bsu018_u:584: bahiścodyānasya samantena pariṇāyakaratnaṃ vijahāra sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu018_u:585: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī divasedivase nagarānniryāti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu018_u:586: tasya yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevodyānaṃ prāviśat,
S04bsu018_u:587: praviśya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopajagāmopetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ trīnvārān pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:589: svayaṃ ca praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena lehyapeyena svahastaṃ [KpSū_58] saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:590: svahastaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhagavataṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātrapāṇiṃ svayameva vyajanamādāya bhagavantaṃ vījayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:591: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya rājaputrasahasraṃ koṭṭarājasahasraṃ caivaṃrūpamupasthānaṃ kṛtvā vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvakān vījayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:593: gaganatale cānekairdevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭirabhivṛṣṭā divyāni vādyāni abhivādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:594: divyāni ca chatrāṇi vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca pralambayanti /
S04bsu018_u:595: nīlavāsasaṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ catvāriṃśacchatasahasrāṇi ye candanadīpāt gośīrṣasya candanasya kāṣṭhānyānayanti,
S04bsu018_u:597: rātrau svayameva rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purato bhikṣusaṅghasya cānekāni dīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi jvālayati /
S04bsu018_u:598: atha kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā ekāṃ dīpasthālikāṃ śirasyupasthāpayitvā dvāvaṃśayordvau pāṇyordvau caraṇayordīpasthālīḥ,
S04bsu018_u:601: tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorevamaklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacitto māsatrayaṃ bhagavantamupasthitavān /
S04bsu018_u:602: evaṃ sahasraṃ rājāputrāṇāṃ caturaśītiśca koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi anyāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:604: yathā rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhan tathāgatamupasthitavān tathāgramahiṣī devī māsatrayaṃ gandhapuspairupasthitavatī /
S04bsu018_u:606: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiṃ jāmbūnadamayāni niṣkasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:607: cakraratnacakrapūrvaṃgamāni ca suvarṇamayāni caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:610: maṇiratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītiḥ sūryakāntimaṇisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:612: upasthānāya pariṇāyakaratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi bhagavata upasthānāya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:613: añcuranagarapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi bhagavata upajīvyāni niryātayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:614_1: chatrasahasrāṇi caturaśītyudārāṇāṃ rājārhanāṃ vastrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturaśītisahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:615: ratnamayāḥ śakunā ratnamayāśca mṛgāścaturaśītivyajanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:616: caturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:622: punarapyahaṃ bhagavantamupasaṃkramiṣye darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca" /
S04bsu018_u:623_0: [KpSū_61] yacca rājño 'raṇeminaḥ putrasahasraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya bhagavantamekaikamidamavocat
S04bsu018_u:625: teṣāṃ adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā viditvātha rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triskṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavanto 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:626: atha teṣāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭho 'nimiṣo nāmā bhagavantaṃ traimāsamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopastiṣṭhati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:627: tadyathā rājāraṇemī tathaivamanimiṣapramukhaṃ rājakumārasahasraṃ dinedine bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ /
S04bsu018_u:628: atha kulaputra bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:629: sa sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācate,
S04bsu018_u:630: sa taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhītastaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpanivāsilokaṃ triśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:632: tenaivamanvāhiṇḍatā na sa kaścijjambūdvīpe manuṣyabhūto [KpSū_62] 'sti yaḥ samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena piṇḍakena na parigṛhīto,
S04bsu018_u:635: yo vā nānuttare jñāne samādāpito na pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:638: animiṣo 'pi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ māsatrayamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā,
S04bsu018_u:639_0: so 'pi trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi niryātayati sarvasauvarṇāni
S04bsu018_u:641: ekaikaśaścaturaśītisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitavanta evaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:643: atha sa rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpitavān bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:644: animiṣo rājakumāro bhagavantamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā tathaiva dakṣiṇā dattā anantā /
S04bsu018_u:645: evamindragaṇena māsatrayaṃ bhagavān upasthito vibhavaśca parityaktaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:692: yāvad araṇemino rājñaḥ putrasahasreṇa ekaikena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ [KpSū_64] sārdhamaprameyena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:693: evaṃrūpeṇa bhagavata upasthānenopasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairmāsatrayaṃ yathā jyeṣṭhena rājaputreṇa,
S04bsu018_u:694: tathaivaikaikaścaturaśītiḥ svarṇamayāścakrasahasrāṇi vistareṇa yāvaccaturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitāni bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:695_0: evaṃrūpeṇa mahāprasādena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā kecid devatvaṃ kecicchakratvaṃ kecin māratvaṃ
S04bsu018_u:695_1: keciccakravartirājyaṃ kecin mahābhogatāṃ kecicchrāvakayānaṃ kecit pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayanti,
S04bsu018_u:696: adhiṣṭhamānāśca dvau varṣaśatau pañcapañcāśacca varṣāṇi bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayanti [KpSū_65] bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca /
S04bsu018_u:697: tatkāle samudrareṇurbrāhmano 'grapurohito 'bhyāgato 'drākṣīt taṃ bhagavantaṃ tai rājaputrairupasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrayate,
S04bsu018_u:700: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa evaṃrūpeṇa sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannenopasthānena bhagavata upasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena
S04bsu018_u:701: atha khalu kulaputrāpareṇa samayena samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ cetasaḥ parivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu018_u:704: kim ayaṃ prārthayati devatvaṃ vā uta śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā mahābhogatāṃ vā śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vānuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim ākāṅkṣate /
S04bsu018_u:709_0: kaccit svapne nivedayatu devo vā yakṣo vā nāgo vā buddho vā śrāvako vā brāhmaṇo vā
S04bsu018_u:709_1: kin tāvad rājā devaśriyaṃ kāṅkṣate uta manuṣyaśriyaṃ atha śrāvakatvamatha pratyekabuddhabhūmimatha
S04bsu018_u:710: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ agrapurohitaḥ svapne tathārūpamavabhāsamadrākṣīt,
S04bsu018_u:711: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:712: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasya brāhmaṇasya padmāni svarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni aśmagarbhakeśarāṇi preṣayanti /
S04bsu018_u:713: sarveṣu ca teṣu padmeṣu sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu018_u:715: ekaikasmācca sūryamaṇḍalāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo niścerustā raśmayaḥ sarvāstasya brāhmaṇasya vaktre praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:717: svakāyasya ca kukṣau ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭāṃ dhyāyamānāṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:719: chatraṃ copari cākāśe [KpSū_67] yāvad brahmalokaparyante sthitaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:721: tebhyaśca padmebhyo divyānyatikrāntamānuṣāṇi tūryāṇi niścaranti śṛṇoti ca /
S04bsu018_u:723: rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena dhāvantaṃ sūkaramukhena vividhān bahuprāṇino bhakṣayante,
S04bsu018_u:725: vividhāśca prāṇinaḥ samāgamya taṃ rājānaṃ bhakṣayanti yāvad asthiśaṅkalāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā chorayanti /
S04bsu018_u:726: evaṃ punaḥ punastathaiva prādurbhavantaṃ sūkaramukhaṃ rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena bahuvidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:728: punaraparaṃ rājaputrān paśyati sūkaramukhenāpare gajamukhenāpare mahiṣamukhenāpare siṃhamukhenāpare vṛkamukhenāpare śṛgālamukhenāpare śvamukhenāpare markaṭamukhena paśyati,
S04bsu018_u:729: śoṇitābhyukṣitagātrānanekavidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇān vividhaiḥ prāṇibhirbhakṣyamāṇān asthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭānutsṛṣṭān /
S04bsu018_u:730: punarapi tenaiva kāyena sthitān tathaiva prāṇino bhakṣayataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:731: anyāṃśca rājaputrān paśyati mahiṣarathābhirūḍhān sumanāpuṣpābhyalaṅkṛtān [KpSū_68] kupathena dakṣiṇābhimukhān gacchataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:734: bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ prathamaṃ rājñaḥ saṃvibhāgamekaṃ padmamanuprayaccha,
S04bsu018_u:739: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ padmāni bhājayamāna eva pratibuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:741_0: "hīnapraṇidhirayaṃ rājā cakravartī saṃsārasukhābhirato hīnā vāsyādhimuktiḥ sārdhamekatyai
S04bsu018_u:741_1: rājaputrairekatyāḥ punā rājaputrāḥ śrāvakayānamākāṅkṣanti ye mayā mahiṣarathābhirūḍhā
S04bsu018_u:743: yacca mayādhatriyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvat pratiṣṭhāpiṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:744: tad evaṃ mayā sarvajambūdvīpe gatānekāni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:745: tasyaitannimittaṃ yena mayā svapne mahāvabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ [KpSū_69] daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:746_0: yacca mayā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācayitvā
S04bsu018_u:746_1: bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triśaraṇakriyāvastuṣu sthāpitāni vinītāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:747: yacca mayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saptavarṣāṇyupanimantritaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:748: tena mama daśabhyo digbhyaḥ anyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ padmānyanupreṣitāni /
S04bsu018_u:750: tena te buddhā saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjayanti /
S04bsu018_u:755: yacca kukṣau bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāni dhyāyamānāni,
S04bsu018_u:757: yacca me śakrabrahmalokapāla dṛṣṭā ājñāpayantīmāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru,
S04bsu018_u:758: yacca mayā tāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kṛtvā dattāni /
S04bsu018_u:759: yannvaham imāḥ svapnā buddhāya bhagavata ākhyāsye,
S04bsu018_u:762: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ tasyā eva rātryā atyayena bhojanaṃ sajjīkṛtvā kālyate eva yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma,
S04bsu018_u:763: upetya svayameva bhagavato hastaśaucamupanāmayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:764: hastaśaucamupanīya prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:765_0: saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhikṣusaṅghamanekaparyāyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:765_1: viditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcamāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:766: atha rājāraṇemī tatraivābhyāgataḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇānekaiśca prāṇisahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:767: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat,
S04bsu018_u:768: praviśya ca yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāmopetya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghasya ca bhagavataḥ purataḥ niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:769: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yathādṛṣṭāṃ svapnāṃ bhagavato nivedayati /
S04bsu018_u:770: bhagavān āha - "yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt mahāntamavabhāsaṃ yenāvabhāsena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu [KpSū_71] buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭā tava padmāni visarjayanti,
S04bsu018_u:771: teṣu ca padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛṣṭā raśmayaḥ pramuñcamānāste ca raśmayastava mukhe praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:773: tena tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāśca,
S04bsu018_u:774: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:775: yacca tvayā sarvasattvārthaṃ mahāyajñasyārambhaḥ kṛtastena tvaṃ brāhmaṇa buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:776: ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:777: yaiśca tava padmāni visarjitāni suvarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni asmagarbhakeśarāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:778: teṣu ca sarveṣu padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:780: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt svapne ye daśausu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:782: yāni chatrāṇi copari cākāśe yāvad [KpSū_72] brahmalokaparyantaṃ saṃtiṣṭhanti /
S04bsu018_u:783: yasyāṃ eva rātrau tvaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase tasyāṃ eva rātrau daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣūdāraḥ kīrtiśabdaśloko 'bhyudgacchate,
S04bsu018_u:784: upari ca yāvad brahmalokaparyantaṃ kṛtvā na śakyante tava mūrdhānaṃ vyavalokayituṃ brahmādibhirdevalokairapi /
S04bsu018_u:786: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣit mahāntamātmabhāvaṃ yāvad brahmalokaṃ yacca sūryamaṇḍalānāṃ mālā śīrasi baddhā,
S04bsu018_u:787: tadye tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāḥ samādāpitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:788: te ca tavābhisaṃbuddhabodherbrāhmaṇa buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu deśasu dikṣu sthitā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S04bsu018_u:789: sarve ye tvayā bodhau samādāpitā te tavābhīkṣṇaṃ varṇaṃ udāhariṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:790: "anena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:793: te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān visarjayiṣyanti tava pūjākarmaṇe, tataste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
S04bsu018_u:795: tatra tava sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā nānāvidhāḥ samādhirdhāraṇīḥ kṣāntiśca pratilapsyante /
S04bsu018_u:796: te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā tava varṇaṃ uccārayiṣyanti ghoṣamanuśrāvayiṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:798: yattvayā brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭā bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tāni tava kukṣau praviśya padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭā dhyāyanti,
S04bsu018_u:799: abhisaṃbuddhabodhiśca tvaṃ brāhmaṇa bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayiṣyasi avaivartikāni sthāpayiṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:800_0: te tava parinirvṛtasya brāhmaṇānuttareṇa parinirvāṇena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:800_1: kalpeṣu paścāddaśāsu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu te buddhā bhagavanto dharmeṇa rājyaṃ
S04bsu018_u:801: "evam asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣvatikrānteṣu evaṃnāmā tathāgato abhūd arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:802: tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃboddhau samādāpitā vinītā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā avaivartikāśca sthāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:806_0: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapne dṛṣṭavān sūkaramukhena yāvacchvamukhena rudhiramrakṣitena
S04bsu018_u:806_1: gātreṇānekavidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā hīna eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇāste 'pyanye vividhaiḥ
S04bsu018_u:807: punarapyāpyāyitakāyā rudhirābhyaktena kāyena yāvacchvamukhena bahuvidhāṃ prāṇino bhakṣayitvā punarhīnasyairaṇḍavṛkṣasya mūle niṣaṇṇā vividhaiśca prāṇibhiḥ khādyante /
S04bsu018_u:808: te tvayā mohapuruṣāstrividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni samādāpitā prātiṣṭhāpitā dāne yame saṃyame ca,
S04bsu018_u:811: trividhe ca puṇyakriyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpitā deveṣu devarājyamabhilaṣanti manuṣyeṣu caikadvīpaiśvaryamākāṅkṣante /
S04bsu018_u:814: evaṃ te mohapuruṣāḥ sarve tvayā trividhe puṇyakriyāvastuni
S04bsu018_u:817: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇa svapnamadrākṣīt apare manuṣyā mahiṣarathābhirūdhāḥ sumanāmālālāṅkṛtaśirasaḥ apathena dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:818: te 'pi tvayā brāhmaṇa kulaputrāḥ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ kevalamātmadamanārthaṃ ātmaśamanārthaṃ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:820: atha khalu kulaputra brāhmaṇaḥ samudrareṇū rājānamāraṇeminametadavocat - "durlabhaṃ mahārāja manuṣyatvaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:830: dakacandropamā bālāḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇairatṛptā viṣayeṣu mattā devamāṇuṣāṃ śriyamabhilaṣanti /
S04bsu018_u:831_0: te bālāḥ punaḥ punarnarakeṣu kāraṇāduḥkhamanubhavanti tiryakṣu saṃmohaduḥkhaṃ preteṣu
S04bsu018_u:831_1: kṣutpipāsāduḥkhaṃ manuṣyeṣu priyaviprayogaduḥkhaṃ deveṣu cyavanaduḥkhaṃ punargarbhavāsaduḥkhaṃ
S04bsu018_u:835: kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ na kurvanti na vyāyamanti aprāptasya prāptaye 'nadhigatasyādhigamāyāsākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai /
S04bsu018_u:836: evaṃ mūrkhā bālāḥ khidyante bodhicittena yatra sarvaduḥkhakṣayo bhavati,
S04bsu018_u:837: saṃsāreṇa ca na khidyante nodvijanti yatra punaḥ punarduḥkhotpattirbhavati /
S04bsu018_u:838: parīkṣasva mahārāja yathā saṃsāraḥ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ bhājanabhūtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:839: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja kṛtādhikāro bhagavataḥ śāsane 'varopitakuśalamūlastriṣu ratneṣu labdhaprasādaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:840: bhagavato dattadāno [KpSū_77] mahābhogatāyai rakṣitaśīlaḥ svargopapattipratilābhāya śruto bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ prajñāmahādharmapratilābhāya te saṃpatsyante /
S04bsu018_u:845: yanmahābrāhmaṇa mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ dharmaḥ śrutaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:880: rājā prāha - "ayaṃ brāhmaṇa tathāgataḥ aśītivarṣasāhasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ loka utpanno,
S04bsu018_u:882: ye sattvā avaruptakuśalamūlaste sattvāḥ phale sthitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:884: utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāstu ye sattvāste bodhau avaivartyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:887: katame sattvā bhagavatā vinītāḥ sadekasattvasyāpi duḥkhaṃ na praśāntaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:891: bodhisattvacaryāṃ caraṃstenāhaṃ mahājñānasamucchrayeṇa acintyenodāreṇa dharmamukhapraveśena sattvān vinayeyaṃ buddhakāryaṃ ca kuryāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:892: na kevalamasmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhāya cittaṃ [KpSū_80] pariṇāmayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:894: tadāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yadāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ ca spṛśeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:895: sarvaṃ ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ praśamayeyaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:896: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastādṛśamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān tadādarśavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:897: tathā samāhitena bhagavatā ādarśavyūhe samādhau tathārūpāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:898: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣvekaikasyāṃ diśi sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā lokadhātavaḥ sarvaguṇavyūhā dṛṣyante;
S04bsu018_u:901: yatra ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇā māraṃ parājayanti,
S04bsu018_u:904: yatra ca buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sphuṭāṃ buddhakṣetrāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:907: yatra ca śūnyaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ buddhebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ [KpSū_81] śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:916: kvacidvivṛttāstiṣṭhanti; te sarva udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:917: sarvāvatī sā parṣattāṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhān,
S04bsu018_u:921: athāraṇemī rājā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - "kena bhagavan karmaṇā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S04bsu018_u:922: kena karmaṇāpariśuddhaṃ; utkṛṣṭāḥ sattvāḥ kena karmaṇā,
S04bsu018_u:924: bhagavān āha - "praṇidhānavaśena mahārāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti apagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:926: rājā prāha - "ahaṃ bhadanta [KpSū_82] bhagavan nagaraṃ praviśyaikāgre niṣadya praṇidhānaṃ cintayiṣyāmi,
S04bsu018_u:927: tathārūpaṃ me buddhakṣetramapagatapañcakaṣāyaṃ rocate tatremā subhavacaryā pariṇāmayiṣyāmi" /
S04bsu018_u:929: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:930: nagaraṃ praviśya svake gṛha ekāgraḥ pratisaṃlīno niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:934: yacca tvayā tribhiḥ puṇyakriyāvastubhiḥ śubhaṃ caratā puṇyamārjitaṃ tatsarvamanuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayā" /
S04bsu018_u:935: sa prāha - "ahamapyupādhyāya svagṛhaṃ gatvaikākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃścintayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:936: yadi bodhāya cittamutpatsyate, punarāgamya bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ bodhicittaṃ pariṇāmayiṣyāmi" /
S04bsu018_u:937: ataḥ so 'pi rājaputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghasya ca triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:938: [KpSū_83] svakaṃ niveśanaṃ gatvā ekākī rahogato niṣadya buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ cintayati /
S04bsu018_u:939: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimantrayitvovāca,
S04bsu018_u:944: anyāni ca navatiḥ koṭyaḥ sattvānāṃ bodhau samādāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:947: evamuktvā sarva eva svagṛhāṇi gatvaikākino niṣaṇṇāḥ saptavarṣāṇi buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānāni cintayanti //
S04bsu018_u:948: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ apareṇa samayena cetasaḥ parivitarka udāpādi /
S04bsu018_u:950: ayaṃ ca mayā buddho bhagavān saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakarṇairupanimantritaḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena /
S04bsu018_u:951: yadi ca mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āśā paripūryate tathā cāyaṃ praṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate yad ahaṃ devāsuragandharvayakṣarākṣasakumbhāṇḍān asmin mahāyajñe samādāpayāmi" /
S04bsu018_u:953: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ purohito vaiśravaṇamākāṅkṣate darśanāya /
S04bsu018_u:954_0: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājānekairyakṣaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya
S04bsu018_u:956: " vaiśrāvaṇaḥ prāha - "śrutaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇāsti vaiśravaṇo nāma yakṣādhipatiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:957: so ahaṃ; brāhmaṇa kim ājñāpayasi kiṃ karavāṇi?" /
S04bsu018_u:961: "tena hi tvaṃ mahārāja yākṣān asmākaṃ vacanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpaya /
S04bsu018_u:968: vaiśravaṇo mahārājā tasya brāhmaṇasya pratiśrutya tatraivāntarhitaḥ bherīmāhatya yakṣarākṣasāṃ sannipātyaitadavocat [KpSū_85] - "yat khalu mārṣā jānīyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:970: taṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupasthāsyati /
S04bsu018_u:972: tena ca yūyaṃ kuśalamūlenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatā" /
S04bsu018_u:973: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahuyakṣarākṣasakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi añjaliṃ kṛtvocuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:975: tatsarvaṃ vayaṃ puṇyaskandhamanumodāmastena ca kuśalamūlenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyemahi" /
S04bsu018_u:977: yaḥ kaścid yuṣmākaṃ kuśalamūlenārthikaḥ puṇyārthī sa saptavarṣān pārāt samudrasya gośīrṣoragasāracandanamānayatu,
S04bsu018_u:978: yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato bhikṣusaṅghasya cāhāraṃ sajjīkuryāt" /
S04bsu018_u:981: [KpSū_86] yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo bhagavato 'rthāyāhāraṃ sajjīkariṣyati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca" /
S04bsu018_u:991: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo viruḍhakasya mahārājasyākāṅkṣati darśanaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:992: tato virūḍhako mahārājā yena samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇastenopajagāmopetya yāvad anekakumbhāṇḍakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādayanti /
S04bsu018_u:994: atha khalu dvitīyikāyāścāturdvīpikāyā lokapālā buddhānubhāvenāgatāḥ samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya sakāśat,
S04bsu018_u:996: te 'pi gatvā svakaṃ svakaṃ parṣadamanuttarāyāṃ [KpSū_87] samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti,
S04bsu018_u:997: yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasrāt koṭīśataṃ vaiśravaṇānām saparṣatkānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti,
S04bsu018_u:998: koṭīśataṃ vīrūḍhakānām koṭiśataṃ virūpākṣāṇāṃ koṭiśataṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sapārṣadyānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayanti /
S04bsu018_u:1000: "yadyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ āśā ca samṛdhyeta yadi ca me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyeta,
S04bsu018_u:1004: sacedahamanena puṇyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyañchakro mamādya devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu,
S04bsu018_u:1005: suyamo devaputraḥ saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatu" /
S04bsu018_u:1006: sahacittotpādādeva kulaputra samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasya śakro devānāmindro darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1007: suyāmaśca [KpSū_88] devaputraḥ saṃtuṣitaśca devaputraḥ sunirmitaśca devaputraḥ paranirmitavaśavartī ca devaputraḥ taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /

S04bsu018_u:1364_0: avalokiteśvara āha - "yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:1364_1: pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:1364_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1365: calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S04bsu018_u:1368: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_121] buddhakṣetreṣu dharaṇī pracalitā,
S04bsu018_u:1369: te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
S04bsu018_u:1374: prakampitā dharaṇīsakṣetra ṣaḍvikāro bhaviṣyasi jināgrapugalo maharṣī" //
S04bsu018_u:1375: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:1377: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmaya,
S04bsu018_u:1379: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - "yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:1381: yacca kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1382: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1384: tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1390: sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya" /
S04bsu018_u:1392: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ yathā svayaṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1393: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputra tasmin buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1398: tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena kāyena pādau vandāmi tadā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu,
S04bsu018_u:1400_0: yadā kulaputra mahāsthāmaprāptena satpuruṣeṇa ratnagarbhasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādābhivandanaṃ
S04bsu018_u:1405: calitā mahāpṛthivī vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭā sumanā varṣairbhaviṣyasi tvaṃ suranarabrahmabhūtaḥ" //
S04bsu018_u:1409: pratigṛhyāñjaliṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - "yanmayā bhagavān sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:1413: na tu kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ, na cātikṣipraṃ prāpnuyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1415: daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1416: ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitā yeṣāṃ mayā tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1417: pāramitāsu ca ye mayā samādāpitā niveśitā pratiṣṭhāpitā bodhicaryāṃ caratā,
S04bsu018_u:1418: tān ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālikāsame buddhakṣetre paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato dharman deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1421: tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ sattvānāmāśayapariśodhayamānaḥ yāvantaḥ kecit sattvā [KpSū_125] mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran ta evaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ tadyathā brahmakāyikā devāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:1422: tathā ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1423: tasya ca buddhakṣetrasya bhavāgraparyantāni prākārāṇi anekaratnasaṃsthitāni nānāratnapratyuptāni ca syuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1424: sarvā ca tatra buddhakṣetre śuddhavaiḍūryamayī pṛthivī syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1427: sarvasattvāścopapādukāḥ syurna tatra sattvāḥ kavadīkārāhārāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1428: sarve ca tatra sattvā prītyāhārā dharmāhārāḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1429: na tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptiḥ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1430: śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapagatakhilamaladveṣamrakṣāṇāṃ śuddhānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1431: sarve tatra bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastradhāriṇaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1433: teṣāṃ dakṣiṇe haste ratnapātrī nānārasapūrṇā prādurbhavet;
S04bsu018_u:1434: samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyurnāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ ye vayaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāramāharema,
S04bsu018_u:1435: [KpSū_126] yannūnaṃ vayamanyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato 'nenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmo buddhaśrāvakāṃśca duḥkhitaṃ ca janaṃ pratimānayāmaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1436: pretabhavaneṣu ca gatvā kṣuttarṣaprajvalitagātrān sattvān anenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmaḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:1437: sahacittotpādena te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā acintyacāritravatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1438: tasya ca samādheḥ pratilābhādasajjanā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1439: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavata āhāreṇa pratimānayeyuḥ śrāvakāṃścānyāṃśca sattvāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1440: prītyā pratimānya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svabuddhakṣetraṃ āgaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1442: yāvat tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svakaṃ buddhakṣetramāgatyānyonyaṃ cīvareṇa prāvarayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1443: yāvanti ca tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmupabhogaḥ paribhogā
S04bsu018_u:1444: bhaveyustaiḥ sarvairbuddhaiḥ śrāvakaiścānyaiśca sattvaiḥ sahasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā paścādātmanā paribhuñjeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1451: yāni maṇiratnāni daśasu dikṣvadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi tāni aśrutapūrvāṇi tāni maṇiratnāni pracareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1452: yeṣāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ nāmadheye nirdiśyamāne varṣakoṭyo 'pi kṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1453: yaśca bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣeta svarṇamayaṃ eva buddhakṣetraṃ paśyeyaṃ tasya svarṇamayaṃ eva tiṣṭheta /
S04bsu018_u:1454: yo rūpyamayamākāṅkṣeta sa rūpyamayaṃ paśyet, na cāsya suvarṇamayaṃ parihāyeyaṃ, peyālaṃ pūrvavat /
S04bsu018_u:1455: ya ākāṅkṣeta sphatikamayaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ aśmagarbhamayaṃ lohitamuktāmayaṃ musālagalvamayaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ paśyema, ityākāṅkṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1456: agarumayaṃ tagaramayaṃ tamālapatramayaṃ yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣeduragasāracandanamayaṃ goṣīrṣacandanamayaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭuṃ tasya tathaiva syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1457: yathā yathā yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathā tathā tādṛśaṃ syāt; na caiko dvitīyasya praṇidhiḥ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1459: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sūryācandramasau [KpSū_128] prajñāyeyātāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1463: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre rātridivasānāṃ nāmadheyamapi prajñāyate, anyatra kusumavikasanatayā /
S04bsu018_u:1464_0: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śītoṣṇaṃ prajñāyate na vyādhirna glānyaṃ na jarāmaraṇamanyatra
S04bsu018_u:1464_1: yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣedbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ so 'nyatra lokadhātāvuṣitvā āyuḥ kṣapayitvā
S04bsu018_u:1468: sarvatra ca buddhakṣetre gaganatale tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrā vādyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1469: na ca tebhyastūryebhyaḥ kāmopasaṃhitāḥ śabdā niścareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1473_2: liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tāni sthānāni tāni praṇidhānāni sarva eva mama buddhakṣetre praviśeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1475: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre narakatiryakpretāḥ prajñāyeyurna sumerurna cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na śīlāpāṃśuparvatāḥ prajñāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1478: anyatra divyaiḥ kusumairmāndāravamahāmāndāravairna ca tatra durgandhaṃ syānnānāgandhairudārodāraistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1482: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvannaivaṃvidhaṃ mahāpuruṣakāramabhiniṣpādayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:1484: evaṃrūpaiḥ śuddhāśayaiḥ sattvairekajātipratibaddhairbodhisattvaiḥ [KpSū_130] sārdhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetramākīrṇaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:1485: na tatra bodhisattvaḥ syād yo na mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitaḥ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:1486: sarve te tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāḥ pāramitāsu niveśitāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:1487: tatraivedaṃ buddhakṣetramantargataṃ kuryāṃ sarve cāmī duḥkhā praśamayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1488: bodhisattvabhūto 'haṃ bhadanta bhagavan evaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ niṣpādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1493: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya gandhenābhayā ca kṛtsanaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:1494: tasya mūle pañcacāturdvīpikapramāṇaṃ me nānāratnavicitraṃ vajrāsanaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1497_1: parinirvāṇakālaṃ tatparyaṅkaṃ na [KpSū_131] bhindyāṃ na muceyaṃ na tasmād bodhivṛkṣamūlāduttiṣṭheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1498: bodhivṛkṣamūlastha evāhaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo 'haṃ nirmitān buddhān bodhisattvāṃśca gaṇanātikrānteṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1499: ekaiko buddha ekapūrvabhaktena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet,
S04bsu018_u:1500: tenaiva pūrvabhaktena gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ avaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1502: bodhiprāptasya me gaṇanātikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu mama kāyo dṛṣyet,
S04bsu018_u:1503: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mama kāyo lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtaścakṣurindriyasyābhāsamāgacchet sarve te sattvā niyatā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1504: yāvad bodhiparinirvāṇena te sattvā avirahitā bhaveyurbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1505: na tatrendriyavikalā bhaveyurye ca tatra bodhisattvā māṃ draṣṭuṃ iccheyuste yena yenaiva gaccheyuḥ parivarteyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyuḥ tiṣṭheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1506: sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samanantarotpāditena buddhanamaskāracittena māṃ bodhivṛkṣaniṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1507: dṛṣṭvā ca yasya dharmasaṃśayaḥ syāt so 'sya sahadarśanena vigacchettīrṇavacikitsāḥ syādanupadiṣṭasya dharmapadasyārthamājāneyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1508: apramāṇaṃ me [KpSū_132] āyurbhavet na śakyate kenacid gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena,
S04bsu018_u:1510: yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe 'haṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe tatra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastrāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1511: yāvan mama parinirvāṇānna cātra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi dīrghakeśaḥ syāt śuklaprāvaraṇo vā,
S04bsu018_u:1514: tvamapi paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī atīvaśobhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1516: yatastvaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāmarthāyaivaṃrūpāṃ pravarāṃ praśastāṃ matiṃ kṛtavān pravaro buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1518_1: praviṣṭe ca tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuddhavirajaḥsannicayo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:1522: [KpSū_133] samantadarśī nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1523: evaṃrūpā ca te bodhisattvaparṣadbhaviṣyati sarve caite praṇidhānāstvayi saṃpatsyante yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1526: ye ca te mañjuśrīssattvā nāmaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:1528_0: mañjuśrīrāha - "yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśāparipūrirbhavediti yathā me praṇidhānaṃ
S04bsu018_u:1528_1: kṛtaṃ tathā caiva māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:1528_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu018_u:1533: tebhyaśca māndāravebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaratu yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ [KpSū_134] pāramitāśabdaḥ balavaiśāradyaśabdaśca niścaratu /
S04bsu018_u:1534: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeya tadā caivaṃrūpaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhavet" /
S04bsu018_u:1535: yadā ca mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā tatkṣaṇādevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhakṣetrāḥ prakaṃpitā,
S04bsu018_u:1537: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā abhavanyathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1538: ye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti te tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti,
S04bsu018_u:1539: "ko 'tra hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ nimittānāṃ prādurbhāvāya?
S04bsu018_u:1540: " te ca buddhā bhagavanto mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1543: calitā kṣitiḥ tarpitāḥ sattvāḥ saukhyaiḥ puṣpāḥ pravṛṣṭā bheṣyase buddha loka" // iti //
S04bsu018_u:1545: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ rājaputramānaṅgaṇaṃ nāmāmantrayati /
S04bsu018_u:1552: tena tvaṃ kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma bodhisattvo bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:1555: samantabhadro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno bhaviṣyasi yāvad buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:1556: evaṃrūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetramanekaguṇavyūhitaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:1558: samanantaravyākṛtaśca kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1560_0: sa āha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:1561: ye ca tatra lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannā bhaveyuḥ nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā devā vā manuṣyā vā te sarve taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1562: teṣāṃ kāyavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittavyādhiḥ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca tāvacciraṃ praśāntaṃ bhavedyāvadahaṃ śīrṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:1563: atha khalu kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandate /
S04bsu018_u:1564: atha tavadeva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā babhūvuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1565: sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kāyavyādhiścittavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca praśāntaṃ pratiprasrabdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1570: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ rājaputramabhayaṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu018_u:1573: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yatra na narakā bhaveyurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1574: yatra nīlavaiḍūryamayī bhūmirvistareṇa yathā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhā tathā vaktavyāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1575: abhayaśca rājaputro ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrataḥ padmaṃ sthāpayitvāha /
S04bsu018_u:1576: "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:2736_3: udgate daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:2736_4: [KpSū_233] tiṣṭhato yāpayataḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2743_0: ye ca tasmin samaye dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dṛṣṭimārgasaṃpratipannā
S04bsu018_u:2743_1: ānantaryakārakāḥ kumārgavihanyamānāsteṣāṃ mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2745: astāṃgate jinasūrye tadāhamanābhogena buddhakāryaṃ kuryāṃ yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvānniyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2746: tasmiṃśca kāle 'tikrānte devalokaṃ gatvā devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2751_0: āryasaptadhanavirahitā [KpSū_234] amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakarā
S04bsu018_u:2751_2: sucariteṣu abhiyuktāstriṣu duścariteṣu anabhiyuktā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu abhiyuktā
S04bsu018_u:2752_3: muṣṭasmṛtayaḥ kuśalajugupsakā duḥprajñā alpaśrutā duḥśīlāḥ kuhakā matsariṇaḥ parasparābhāṣakā
S04bsu018_u:2752_5: garbhāśayasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā vividharogapahatāḥ kliṣṭā durvarṇā avahoṭimakā ahrīkā anapatrāpyāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2752_6: parasparabhītā [KpSū_235] ekapūrvabhaktena bahukāyavācā manasā duścaritaṃ samācaranti
S04bsu018_u:2753_1: vihiṃsācittāḥ kaluṣacittā rukṣacittāḥ kṣubhitacittā adāntacittā ahitacittā uddhatacittā
S04bsu018_u:2753_3: dharmavivarjitacittā avipakvacittā dharmeṣu sārambhacittā akuśala utpāditacittāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2756_0: narakaśabdastiryagyoniśabdo yamalokaśabdo vyādhiśabdo jarāśabdo maraṇaśabdo vadhakaśabdo
S04bsu018_u:2756_3: kāmamithyācāraśabdo mṛṣāvādaśabda utpātaśabdaḥ paiśunyaśabdaḥ paruṣaśabdaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaśabda
S04bsu018_u:2758: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇakuśalamūlaiḥ parihīṇakalyāṇamitrairduṣṭacittaiḥ sattvaistasmin kāle sahālokadhāturākīrṇā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:2759_1: āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāstamastamaḥparāyaṇāḥ pragāḍhakarmapratyayena te sattvāstasmin
S04bsu018_u:2760: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmapratyayena sahabuddhakṣetraṃ hīnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:2767: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śaṣpauṣadhitṛṇavṛkṣā patrapuṣpaphalā dhānyarasāḥ sattvānāmannapānabhogaparibhogaviṣamāḥ [KpSū_238] kaluṣaparuṣarukṣaviṣasaṃsṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:2768: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣā duṣṭāścaṇḍā raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakā anyonyāgauravā bhītena cittenāghātacittā
S04bsu018_u:2770: māṃsabhojanarudhirāhārā mṛgacarmaprāvaraṇāḥ praharaṇādhiṣṭhānāḥ prāṇivadhodyuktā rūpakulavaṃśaiśvaryaśāstralipyaśvārohaṇadhanurgrahāyudhaparivārā mātsaryadarpitā bhaviṣyanti;
S04bsu018_u:2772: tatkālamahaṃ tuṣitabhavanādavatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravartikulavaṃśe īśvare rājakule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineyasattvakuśalamūlaparipācanārthaṃ garbhavāsamupagṛhṇīyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2773: sarvāvantaṃ tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2774: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyanto 'haṃ heṣṭhaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2775: ye ca tasmin samaye sattvā sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātā narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā devamanuṣye [KpSū_239] vā te sarve tamavabhāsaṃ paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2776: teṣāṃ saṃsāre vimṛśatāṃ duḥkhodvignānāṃ nirvāṇābhilāṣamantaśaḥ kleśaśamacittānyutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2778: yadāhaṃ sarvadharmanayavipaścitaṃ sarvasamādhinirdeśamekadharmamukhamaparāntakalpanirdeśena samāhitacitto daśamāsāṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2779: yāvāṃścāhaṃ prāpte buddhatve sattvāṃ parikhinnāṃ saṃsāre parimocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2780: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2781: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2782: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2783: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2785: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2786: [KpSū_240] tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2789: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantena;
S04bsu018_u:2790: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2793_0: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā
S04bsu018_u:2793_1: śakrā vā candrā vā sūryā vā lokapālā vā mahānāgarājā vāsurendrā vā aupapādukā vā
S04bsu018_u:2793_2: maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2795: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ [KpSū_241] prasādaṃ pratilaṃbhayet /
S04bsu018_u:2796: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
S04bsu018_u:2797: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2798: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
S04bsu018_u:2799: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2800: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2801: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2802_0: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni
S04bsu018_u:2804: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ sattvānāṃ sarvapuṇyasamuccayena [KpSū_242] samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2805: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2806: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2807: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;
S04bsu018_u:2812: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2814: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2815: caramabhavikāśca mama vaineyā bhaveyuḥ; ye pratyekabuddhayānikā [KpSū_243] yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2817: sarve ca me sākṣiṇo bhaveyurduṣkaracaryāyāṃ; ye ca śrāvakayānikā yāvadyathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2818: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
S04bsu018_u:2821: yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
S04bsu018_u:2822: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2824: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
S04bsu018_u:2827: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:2829: ye manuṣyarājā [KpSū_244] vā bhaṭṭā vā naigamajānapadā gṛhasthapravrajitā gṛhāgārasaṃpannāste 'pi mama duṣkaracaryāmupasaṃkrāmeyuryāvacchrāvakayānikā yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2831: sa tasya paścimako mātṛgrāmapratilābho bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:2833: ye mṛgapakṣiṇo duṣkaraṃ caramāṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyussa teṣāṃ paścimakastiryagyonipratilābho bhaved iti;
S04bsu018_u:2834: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2836: evaṃ pretā vaktavyāstāvacciraṃ cāhamevaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ ekaparyaṅkena yāvad bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryāyāṃ sākṣibhūtā bhaveyuḥ āścaryaprāptāśca,
S04bsu018_u:2838_0: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena
S04bsu018_u:2838_1: vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:2839: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ [KpSū_245] śaktāṃścarantu yathāhaṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2840: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2845: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2852: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2853: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2855: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet /
S04bsu018_u:2857: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2859: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2863: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2864: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2865: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ; yathā te sattvāḥ karmāvaraṇaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2867: [KpSū_247] na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:2869_0: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ
S04bsu018_u:2872: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2873_0: ye 'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2873_1: śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2874: tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrādeko buddhavigraha ekadivase [KpSū_248] sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet /
S04bsu018_u:2875: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2876: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2877: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran, upapattiṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2878: yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2880: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2881: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2882: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2883: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
S04bsu018_u:2884: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:2885: [KpSū_249] piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
S04bsu018_u:2886: teṣām sattvānāmarthe 'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2887: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2892: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2893: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste 'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2894: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2900: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2901: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2904: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2985_0: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi

S04bsu018_u:3061: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,

S04bsu018_u:3098: dagdhasantānā akuśalasamavadhānagatā ānantaryakārakā yāvanmithyādṛṣṭikāstena vayaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /

S04bsu018_u:3101: ye ca sattvā bodhyarthikāsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśe mama varṇakīrtiyaśaśca śṛṇuyuste taṃ tathāgataṃ pṛccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3102: "kamarthavaśaṃ sampaśyamānaḥ sa bhagavāṃstathāgata evaṃ pañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?
S04bsu018_u:3103_0: " te ca tathāgatāsteṣāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā imaṃ mama mahākaruṇāsamanvāgataṃ
S04bsu018_u:3103_1: prathamacittotpādaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ praṇidhānapūrvayogaṃ ca bhāṣeyuste ca

S04bsu018_u:3103_3: bhaveyuste 'pyevaṃrūpāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ sattveṣūtpādayeyurevaṃrūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:3104_0: evaṃrūpe tīvrapañcakaṣāye kleśakaṣāye kaliyuge buddhakṣetre ānantaryakārakāṃ yāvadakuśalasamavadhānāṃ
S04bsu018_u:3104_1: vaineyāṃ [KpSū_269] pratigṛhṇīyuste ca buddhā bhagavantastān mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatāṃ

S04bsu018_u:3104_3: taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā tīvrapañcakaṣāye kleśe kaliyuge praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3105: apare buddhā bhagavanto mama śarīravivartanebhiḥ pūrvayogaiḥ sattvānāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā vistareṇa bhāṣayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3107_0: parinirvṛtasya śarīrebhirevaṃ ciramevaṃrūpaṇāṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya evaṃrūpāṇi
S04bsu018_u:3107_1: vividhāni prātihāryāṇi vividhā ca nānāprakārā vikurvaṇākṛtāstasya śarīravikurvaṇābhirvayaṃ
S04bsu018_u:3108: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vayaṃ kuśalamūlasamavadhānān prathamacittotpādādidaṃ pāramitāsu codyogaḥ kṛtaḥ,

S04bsu018_u:3111_0: sa evamāha - "yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tathā cāhamanāgate
S04bsu018_u:3111_1: 'dhvani bhadarake kalpe tīvrakleṣe raṇakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāṇe 'ndhaloke 'nāyake
S04bsu018_u:3112: yadi cāhaṃ śaktaḥ sakalamevaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ yathā ca me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3114: na cānyakṣetre kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayāmi; evameva bhadanta bhagavan vyavasāyaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:3127: yacca mayā bhadanta bhagavan dānamayaṃ vā śīlamayaṃ vā śrutamayaṃ vā bhāvanāmayaṃ vā puṇyamārjitaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:3128: yadi naivaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ pariṇāmayāmi;
S04bsu018_u:3129: ye sattvāḥ pracaṇḍamaṇḍaghore 'vīcau narake duḥkhānyanubhavanti te cānena kuśalamūlena tato vyuttiṣṭhantu,
S04bsu018_u:3133: yacca teṣāṃ sattvānāmaparikṣīṇakarmaphalaṃ syāttadahametarhi kālaṃ kṛtvāvicau mahānarake upapadyeyaṃ;

S04bsu018_u:3137_0: ekaikaśca me ātmabhāvo buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ tīvrāṃ caṇḍāṃ kharāṃ nairayikāṃ

S04bsu018_u:3137_2: lokadhātuṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvadavīciparāyaṇāni karmāṇi samudānītāni syuryacca
S04bsu018_u:3140: sarve ca te sattvā buddhā bhagavanta ārāgayeyuḥ,

S04bsu018_u:3151: ye ca manuṣyāndhabadhirā ajihvākā ahastakā apādakāḥ smṛtipramuṣṭacittairutpādyitavyaṃ aśucibhakṣayitavyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3154: yāvacciraṃ saṃsāre dhātvāyatanaskandhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyustāvacciramahaṃ evaṃrūpāṃ vividhe narakatiryakpreteṣu yakṣāsurarākṣaseṣu yāvan manuṣyaduḥkhopapattibhirevaṃ duḥkhamanubhaveyaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:3158: ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti te mama buddhā bhagavantaḥ [KpSū_274] sākṣībhūtā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:3161: bhadrake kalpe bhaveyamahaṃ viṃśottaravarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān;

S04bsu018_u:3169: etena praṇidhānena jñāyate yathā tvaṃ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvānāṃ bhaiṣajyabhūtastrāṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ;

S04bsu018_u:4026_0: tadāhaṃ mahākalpe vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:4026_1: śāsane saddharmapratirūpake [KpSū_361] vartamāne 'haṃ ca kulaputra tena kālena durdhano
S04bsu018_u:4026_2: nāma babhūva balacakravartī jambūdvīpavijayī sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4028: te 'pyapareṇa samayena niṣkramya gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsane pravrajitāste ca bhūyasyā mātrayā gandhapadmasya tathāgatasya śāsanaṃ jvālitavantaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4029: sthāpayitvā ṣaṭputrāṃ ye na pravrajitā na cecchanti bodhicittamutpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4031: "ko yuṣmākamabhiprāyo yadyūyaṃ bodhicittaṃ notpādayatha, na ca pravrajatha?" /
S04bsu018_u:4036: yaḥ kṣayāntakāle saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne pravrajito 'śaktaḥ sakalaṃ śīlaskandhamārādhayituṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4045: ta āhur["]yadyasmākaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ dadyādevaṃ [KpSū_362] vayaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayemaḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:4046: tadahaṃ kulaputra śrutvā paramaprītamanā evaṃ cintayāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4048: āryāṣṭāṅge upoṣadhavāse samādāpitāstriṣu ca yāneṣu samādāpitā /
S04bsu018_u:4049: yannūnamahamimaṃ jambudvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ dadyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4052: evaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ ṣaḍbhāgaṃ kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ dattaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4053: ahaṃ ca niṣkramya pravrajitaste ca ṣajjambūdvīparājānaḥ parasparaviruddhāḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavigraharogaparacakrasaṃkṣobhavividamāpannāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4061: "mayā caitarhi ātmaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ, sattvāḥ svamānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayitavyās[ /
S04bsu018_u:4062: "]tato 'ham āśramaṃ parityajya madhyameṣu janapadeṣu gatvā dagapālaṃ parvatamabhiruhya praṇidhānamakarot /
S04bsu018_u:4066: yathā tyajāmi priyarūpasaṃpadaṃ na śakrabrahmāṇa na mārakāraṇāt /
S04bsu018_u:4067: arthaṃ karo bheṣyasi devaloke bhaveyaṃ mahyaṃ bahumānsaśoṇitaṃ //
S04bsu018_u:4068: śṛṇvantu nāgā naradevayakṣā ye devatā śailagirau nivāsiṇaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4069: kṛpā mamotpannaya sattvahetoḥ tarpaṣya sattvāṃ svakamāṃsaśoṇitaiḥ" //
S04bsu018_u:4079: mama ca kulaputra sa kāyaḥ sattvaiḥ paribhujyamānaḥ pratidinaṃ vardhate,
S04bsu018_u:4081: sarvatra mānuṣaśirāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ sakeśakarṇanayanānāsauṣṭhadāntāḥ sajihvā anekamukhaśatasahasrāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4088: yasyārthaṃ yenārthaṃ yāvadarthaṃ saṃtarpitaśarīrāḥ paripurṇābhiprāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayatha,
S04bsu018_u:4093: [KpSū_365] ye ca tatra vijñāḥ sattvāste kecicchrāvakayāne cittamutpādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:4102: keciddāntāṃ gṛhṇanti; gṛhitvā prakramanti; praṇidhānavaśena cānyonyaṃ prādurbhavati,
S04bsu018_u:4105: yāvaddaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sarvajambūdvīpakā manuṣyā yakṣamṛgapakṣiṇo 'pi svaśarīreṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:4113: kṛtsnaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prajñāpanapramāṇaṃ me tatra svacarma parityaktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4115: paśya kulaputra daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ svaśarīraparityāgāḥ parityaktā ekajīvitena;
S04bsu018_u:4118: evaṃ ca me tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4122: evameva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā varṣasahasrā asminnarajamerujugupsite buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpo mamātmabhāvaḥ prādurabhavat,
S04bsu018_u:4123: yathaikadvīpe daśavarṣasahasrāṇi evaṃ sarvadvīpeṣu sattvāṃ svamānsarudhiracarmanayanakarṇanāsauṣṭhajihvākeśaiḥ saṃtarpayitvā triṣu yāneṣu samādāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4124: manuṣyāṃ yakṣarākṣasāṃ sarvatiryagyonikān ye kecin mānsarudhirabhojanāhārāḥ pṛthagyakṣā yāvadantaśaḥ yāmalaukikāḥ tāṃścāhaṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4125: yathā cāhamekasmin buddhakṣetre svaśarīreṇa sarvasattvāṃ saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4126_0: evameva samantaddaśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_367] buddhakṣetreṣu svamānsarudhiracarmanayanāṃ
S04bsu018_u:4126_1: yāvajjihvābhirevaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān mahākalpān teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:4128: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyurye daśasu dikṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pravartitadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:4130_0: mā cāhaṃ saṃsāre saṃsaramāṇo buddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇuyāṃ mā ca dharmaśabdaṃ mā saṅghaśabdaṃ
S04bsu018_u:4130_1: mā pāramitāśabdaṃ mā mārabalaparāśayaśabdaṃ mā vaiśāradyaśabdaṃ yāvat kuśalaśabdamapi saṃsāre mā śṛṇuyāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4132: yadi me evaṃrūpaḥ svaśarīraparityāgaḥ sattvasaṃtarpaṇārthe na saṃpadyata,
S04bsu018_u:4133: naivaṃrūpaṃ ca me praṇidhānaṃ paripūri syādyathā me āśā cintitā /
S04bsu018_u:4134: ye 'pi cemasmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvatra dvīpeṣvekaikasmiṃ dvīpa evaṃrūpā ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktāḥ sattvāṃśca mānsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4135: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvā evaṃrūpeṇātmabhāvena svamānsarudhireṇa santarpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4136_0: paśya [KpSū_368] kulaputra tathāgatasya dānapāramitā ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ ya mayānuprabandhena
S04bsu018_u:4136_1: tatkālaṃ netrāḥ parityaktāḥ teṣāṃ punarayaṃ jambūdvīpe yāvattrāyastriṃśaddevaparyantapramāṇe rāśirbhavet /
S04bsu018_u:4138: punaraparaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādaprameyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena ayaṃ buddhakṣetraścandravidyuto nāma babhūva;
S04bsu018_u:4140: ahaṃ cāsmiṃ jambudvīpe rājā babhūva pradīpapradyoto nāma balavāṃścakravartī /
S04bsu018_u:4141: evaṃ ca mayā sarvajaṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ kuśaleṣu niyojitā, yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4142: paścādahamudyānabhūmiṃ niryātaḥ svabhūmidarśanāya; tatra cāhaṃ puruṣamadrākṣaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4143: paścādbāhuṃ gāḍhabandhanaṃ badhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mayāmātyāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4147: yadetasya puruṣasya saṃvatsare śaṣpaṃ dhānyaṃ cotpadyate tato devasya ṣaṭkāṃśo deyaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4148: yathānye kuṭumbino dadantyāyadvāraṃ ye devasya nagaragrāmajanapadakarvaṭeṣu prativasanti [KpSū_369] karmāntena jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
S04bsu018_u:4154: yaddevasya divasedivase 'nnapānabhojanaparibhogo devīnāṃ devasya cāntaḥpuradevasya putrāṇāṃ duhitṛṇāṃ upabhogaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tatparaḥ sakāśāduddhriyate /
S04bsu018_u:4159: imaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ pañcabhāgaśatāni kṛtvā putrāṇāṃ pradattaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4160: ahaṃ ca tapovanaṃ gatvā riṣipravrajyena brahmacaryaṃ cacāra;
S04bsu018_u:4161: vanakhaṇḍe uḍumbaramūle dakṣiṇasya mahāsamudrasya nātidūre navamūlaphalāhāro viharāmi dhyāyī anupūrveṇa pañcābhijñaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4162: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaśatā jambūdvīpakānāṃ vāṇijānāṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇāstaistataḥ prabhūto ratnaskandha āsāditaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4163: tatra ca candro nāma sārthavāhaḥ [KpSū_370] tena bhāgyavatā vijñapuruṣeṇa cintāmaṇiḥ samāsāditaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4164: sa tato ratnadvīpādvipulaṃ ratnadhanaskandhaṃ taṃ ca cintāmaṇiṃ gṛhītvā saṃprasthitaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4165: tataḥ kṣubhitaḥ samudro nāgā ākulā rudanti devatā yāstatra nivāsinyastatra cāśvasto nāma riṣirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānena tatropapannaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4166_0: tena mahāsattvena sa sārthaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa ca mahāsamudrāduttāritastasya ca sārthavāhasyānyataro
S04bsu018_u:4166_1: duṣṭarākṣasaḥ pratyarthiko 'vatāraprekṣī vivaragaveṣī pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4168: yataste vaṇijaḥ praṇaṣṭamārgā paramabhītāduccasvareṇa krandanti rudanti paridevanti,
S04bsu018_u:4170: yāvadaśroṣīdahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa yāvattatrāgatvā vaṇijaḥ samāśvāsitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4173_0: tadāhaṃ paṭṭaṃ tailena mrakṣayitvā svahastaṃ veṣṭya agninā prajvālya satyavacanamakarot
S04bsu018_u:4173_2: hitāya navamūlaphalāhāreṇa caturaśītīnāṃ nāgayakṣasahasrāṇāṃ cittasantatiḥ paripācitā
S04bsu018_u:4174: tena satyena satyavacanena kuśalamūlaparipākena jvalatu me hastaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4175: labhantu mārgaṃ vaṇijaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa jambūdvīpaṃ prāpayantu" /
S04bsu018_u:4177: te vaṇijo jambūdvīpe sthāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ :
S04bsu018_u:4181: sārthavāho bhaveyaṃ jambudvīpe saptavārāṃ cintāmaṇimānayitvā vividhaṃ ratnavarṣaṃ abhipravarṣayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4182: yāvat sarvadvīpeṣvasmin buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu ratnaṃ pravarṣayeyaṃ, yāvatpūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4183: [KpSū_372] evaṃ ca me āśā paripūrṇā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ mahākalpānāmantareṇa sārthavāho 'bhūvan,
S04bsu018_u:4184: gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ratnāni pravarṣitāni;
S04bsu018_u:4186: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ratnaiḥ paripurṇābhiprāyāḥ kṛtāstriṣu ca yāneṣu niyojitāḥ / paśya kulaputra
S04bsu018_u:4189: saṃtoṣaṇe kalpe vartamāne pañcakaṣāye pañcavarṣasahasrikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ praṇidhānenāhamasmin jambūdvīpe sūryamālagandho nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūvan vedapāṭhakaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4190: tatkālaṃ ca sattvā bhūyasā śāśvatadṛṣṭayo 'bhūvan savairaparākramāḥ sakalahādhiṣṭhānāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4191: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ mahābalavegaparākrameṇa sattvānāṃ śatrubhūtaṃ skandhaprayogena dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu018_u:4195: tena ca samayenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā mamāvavādānuśāsanena pañcābhijñāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4196: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ kalahavigrahavairānavasṛjya vanakhaṇḍamāśṛtya vanakhaṇḍe mūlaphalāhārā dhyāyantaścaturbhirbrāhmairvihārai rātridivasamatināmitavantaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4197: tataḥ kṣīyamāṇe kalpe yadā tairdakṣiṇīyaiḥ kṛtsnaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ sphuṭamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:4202: tadāhamevaṃ cintayāmi, "yadyahaṃ sattvānāṃ vyādhiṃ na śaktaḥ śamayituṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4204: "yannūnamahaṃ śakraṃ mahābrāhmaṇaṃ lokapālānanye ca devarṣayo vā [KpSū_374] nāgarṣayo vā śakrarṣayo vā manuṣyarṣayaśca sannipātayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4206: tadāhamṛddhyā gatvā śakrabrahmāṇalokapāladevarṣīṇāṃ nāgarṣīṇāṃ śakrarṣīṇāṃ manuṣyarṣīṇāṃ ārocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4208: tatra saṃnipātayitvā viḍacarakamūrdhani nāma sthānaṃ bhūtasaṃnivāraṇapratiśaraṇaṃ rakṣāvātapittaśleṣmasaṃprasādanaśāstraṃ nirdeśayeyaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4210: tatra mahāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ yathā mayaikadivase 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ prajñāvabhāsaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4216: tadanena kulaputra [KpSū_375] kuśalamūlavipākena iyaṃ me praṇidhānāśā paripūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4219_1: devaloke prakāśite sattvānāmārogyakauśalyamevameva timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu
S04bsu018_u:4221: devanāgayakṣamanuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sannipātitā yaissattvānāmarthāya vividhā vidyāsthānāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4222: yathena timire buddhakṣetre evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4227: anuttarā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpā āśā paripūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4228: api tatra timire buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4229: apyanuttareṇa [KpSū_376] jñānena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvaikaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣvevaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛto,
S04bsu018_u:4232: ayaṃ ca tathāgatasya trayāṇāṃ sucaritānāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ
S04bsu018_u:4233: tathā pratyavarakālasamaye 'saṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairadhikatarairantareṇedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vicitadoṣaṃ nāmābhūt,
S04bsu018_u:4235: purimāyāṃ diśyanupañcāśāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ vaḍaṃ nāma jambūdvīpamabhūt /
S04bsu018_u:4236: tatrāpyahaṃ sattvaparipācanārthamupapannaḥ, caturdvīpeśvaraḥ cakravartī rājā ambaro nāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4237: tatra ca mayā sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāstriṣu yāneṣu samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4239: tatra ca me yācanakā āgatvā vividhāni ratnāni yācanti,
S04bsu018_u:4240: tadyathā hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ [KpSū_377] yāvaccendranīlamahānīlajyotīrasadakaprasādakāni yācanakānāṃ tāvatprabhūtāni ratnāni labhyante /
S04bsu018_u:4244: "nāgarājāno nidhīrnidarśayanti, nidhīnāṃ loke prādurbhāvādratnānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:4245: na kevalaṃ tāttakā nirdeśayanti yāttakā devasya yācanakāḥ" /
S04bsu018_u:4247: "yadyahaṃ pañcakaṣāye loke vartamāne tīvrakleśāraṇe kaliyuge vartamāne varṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4248: tadiyaṃ me āśā paripūryatu, yadahamasmin buddhakṣetre nidhidarśako nāma nāgarājā bhaveyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4249: sarvatra cāsmiṃ vijitaghoṣe buddhakṣetre sarvadvīpeṣu ca ekaikasmin dvīpe saptajanmāni parigṛhṇīyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4250: ekaikasmiṃśca janmani nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi darśayeyaṃ prayaccheyaṃ ca nānāratnaparipūrṇāni:
S04bsu018_u:4252: ekaikaśca nidhiyojanasahasrāṇi gatvā vistareṇa paripūrṇamapi ratnaṃ sattvānāṃ nidarśayeyaṃ prayacchayeyaṃ [KpSū_378] ca,
S04bsu018_u:4254: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasmin kṣetre sarvatra dvīpe saptajanmāni pratigṛhṇīyāṃ",
S04bsu018_u:4256: yadā ca me kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā gaganatale devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairantarīkṣāt puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣitā sādhukāraścānupradattaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4257: "sādhu sādhu sarvaṃdada, ṛdhiṣyati te evaṃrūpā āśā yathā te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4258: aśroṣīn mahājanakāyaḥ rājño 'mbarasya devairgaganatalagataiḥ sarvaṃdada iti nāma kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4261: yadi parityakṣyati tadā sarvaṃdada iti nāma bhaviṣyati" /
S04bsu018_u:4267: tadyadi dāsyati sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati, [KpSū_379] atha na dāsyati na sarvaṃdado bhaviṣyati" /
S04bsu018_u:4268: tatastasyāgrataḥ tatra jyotīraso nāma māṇavako rājño 'mbarasyāgrataḥ sthitvā,
S04bsu018_u:4270: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,

S04bsu018_u:4280: tasya mayā svayameva prasannacittena tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svapādau chitvā pradattau,

S04bsu018_u:4284: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,

S04bsu018_u:4288: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
S04bsu018_u:4297: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:4298: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
S04bsu018_u:4300: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4306: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4307: tatra daṃśamaśakā āgatvā rudhiraṃ pibanti, kurkuraśṛgālagṛdhrā āgatvā mānsaṃ bhakṣayanti /

S04bsu018_u:4316: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa /
