S04bsu018_u:4318_0: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:4318_1: cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya
S04bsu018_u:4319: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4320: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4324: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4328: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca /
S04bsu018_u:4333: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:4334: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4335: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
S04bsu018_u:4336: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā,
S04bsu018_u:4340: yathātra pūrve na [KpSū_384] ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4342: na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
S04bsu018_u:4344: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4345: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne 'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro 'bhūvan savirocano nāma /
S04bsu018_u:4347: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe 'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4348: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītā māṃ pṛcchanti /
S04bsu018_u:4355: tāṃścāhaṃ na khādayāmi ye manuṣyā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātādviratā,
S04bsu018_u:4357: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena [KpSū_385] vā cittānyutpādayanti tānapyahaṃ na khādayāmi" /
S04bsu018_u:4358: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4361: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4364: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā /
S04bsu018_u:4365: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4368: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4370: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
S04bsu018_u:4371: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu [KpSū_386] śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yakṣarūpeṇa mayā manuṣyāḥ kuśalamārgacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /

S04bsu018_u:4375: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4377: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4383: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4387: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4389: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ // 5 //

S04bsu018_u:4393: ye mayā prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,

S04bsu018_u:4395: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto 'drakṣaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:4398_1: [KpSū_389] saṃpuṣpite lokadhātau vimalatejaguṇarājo nāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate
S04bsu018_u:4399: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4400: mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitāḥ, peyālaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:4416: etāṃ pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā kulaputra purimāyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ deśayato buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4417: ye 'nutpāditabodhicittāḥ pūrve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā mayā ca prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4418: mayā ca prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanītā yatra taiḥ sarvaprathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau" //
S04bsu018_u:4419: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ saṃpuṣpitāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4420: ye tatra bodhisattvāste tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya [KpSū_391] tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tameva tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4421: "ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadi idamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ bhagavata āsanaṃ prakaṃpitam[?"]iti /
S04bsu018_u:4422_0: sa tathāgatastānavocat - "asti kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrānatikramya
S04bsu018_u:4422_1: tatra sahā nāma lokadhātustatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /

S04bsu018_u:4426: tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4427: tena tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caratāhaṃ prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
S04bsu018_u:4428: yatra me prathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:4429: sa ca me śākyamunistathāgataḥ kalyāṇamitraḥ sahe lokadhātau tiṣṭhati yāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:4430: sa evaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ imaṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:4432: ko yuṣmākaṃ kulaputrotsahate [KpSū_392] madvacanāt sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gantuṃ śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ paripṛcchanāya?" /
S04bsu018_u:4434_0: "]ya iha bhadanta bhagavan saṃpuṣpite buddhakṣetre ṛddhimantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇapāramitāprāptāste
S04bsu018_u:4436: "vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gamiṣyāmastaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāya paryupasanāya taṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāya" /
S04bsu018_u:4440: "tāmapi vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan diśaṃ na jānīmo yatra sahā lokadhātuḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ" /
S04bsu018_u:4441: tataḥ sa vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārya pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo vividhānyarciṃṣi pramumoca /
S04bsu018_u:4444: yataste bodhisattvāḥ paśyanti sarvāvadimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvairgaganatale ca devanāgayakṣāsuraiḥ sphuṭaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4445: dṛṣṭvā ca punaste bodhisattvāstaṃ vimalaguṇatejarājānaṃ tathāgatamevamāhuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4446: "paśyāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvāvantaṃ sphuṭaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4447: nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśo daṇḍanikṣepaṇamātramapi yanna sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4448: paśyāmaḥ śākyamunistathāgato 'smān nirīkṣate dharmaṃ ca deśayati" /

S04bsu018_u:4450: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau sattvā bhūmisthitā vā antarīkṣasthitā vā tataścaikaikaḥ sattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
S04bsu018_u:4451: "maṃ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sarvacetasā nirīkṣate mamaikamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati" /
S04bsu018_u:4452: sarvavarṇaṃśca sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati ekavarṇasthānaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4453: [KpSū_394] ye ca tatra kulaputra sattvā brāhmabhaktāste śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ brahmāṇaṃ samanupaśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:4454: mahābrahmapativyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti; yāvad ye mārabhaktikā,
S04bsu018_u:4461: ye maheśvarabhaktikāste sattvā maheśvararūpavarṇasaṃsthānavacanavyāhāreṇa śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti /
S04bsu018_u:4462: yāvaccaturaśītistatra sattvānāṃ varṇasaṃsthānabhaktirūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi te tathā caiva śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti" /
S04bsu018_u:4463: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi rahagarjito nāma bodhisattvo dvitīyaśca jyotiraśmirnāma bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4465: "gacchatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ madvacanādārogyakauśalyaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatha" /
S04bsu018_u:4467: "sarvāvantaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sakṣitigaganaṃ [KpSū_395] bodhisattvaiḥ sphuṭaṃ samanupaśyāmaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4468: na cātraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau gagane vā yatra vayaṃ pratitiṣṭhemaḥ" /

S04bsu018_u:4479: ekasmiṃ samaye kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā madhye śailaparvate indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati,
S04bsu018_u:4482: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā tathāgatakāyena sphuṭā,
S04bsu018_u:4484_0: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhir diśābhirdvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sahe
S04bsu018_u:4484_1: lokadhātau yastasya parvatasyābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya
S04bsu018_u:4485: sa ca kulaputra śākyamunistathāgatastatra parśadi ridhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān;
S04bsu018_u:4486: sā ca sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā caivaṃ vipulā ca prādurbhūtā,
S04bsu018_u:4487: yadā te dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sālaguhāyāṃ praviṣṭā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ paśyanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:4488: ekaikaśca bodhisattvastatra tathāgatasya vividhabodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:4489: ekaiko bodhisattvastatra saptaratnamayāsanaṃ nirmitavān yatropaviṣṭā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:4491_0: te ca bodhisattvāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā śākyamunestathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:4491_1: pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4492: aciraprakāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sālaguhā yathā paurvāṇāṃ saṃsthitā /
S04bsu018_u:4495: sa caturaśītibhistrayastriṃśaddevasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sālaguhā yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati /
S04bsu018_u:4496: upasaṃkramya sāmantake indrākṣasya sālaguhābhavane sthitaḥ, tasya bhagavato 'nubhāvena etadabhavat /
S04bsu018_u:4498: sa ca pañcaśikho madhureṇa svareṇa bhagavantamabhimukhaṃ staviṣyati,

S04bsu018_u:4735: na tvevaṃ ṣoḍaśamahākalpān ṣaṭpāramitācaramāṇasya bodhisattvasya puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4737: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sayakṣanāgagandharvakumbhāṇḍapretapiśācakinnarāsurāṇāṃ duṣṭacittānāṃ prasādanaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4758: ko mamemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ rakṣiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4759: adharmabhūmiṣṭhānāṃ sattvānāṃ bhinnaśīlānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ [KpSū_419] karṇapuṭe prakāśayiṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4761: sarvāvatī ca sā parṣā bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya;
S04bsu018_u:4763: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ merupuṇyaṃ yakṣariṣiṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītavān /
S04bsu018_u:4764: bhagavān āha - "udgṛhṇa tvaṃ maharṣa imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4765: yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ deśāntaragatānāmavaivartikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ karṇapuṭeṣu prakāśasva /
S04bsu018_u:4766_1: atikrāmantā yanmayā bhadanta bhagavan pūrvaṃ praṇidhānena yakṣariṣitvālabdhyānuttarāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:4766_2: samyaksaṃbodhau bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇo gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvā mayā caturṣu brāhmavihāreṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4768: [KpSū_420] ahaṃ ca sattvānāṃ svayameva paripācayāmi yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ udgṛhīṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:4770: idamavocadbhagavān āttamanāḥ sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu018_u:4773: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetu teṣāṃ tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4774: hevadatteṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādi mahāśramaṇaṃ //
